name: Texmaster
summary: Texmaster is one of many fan games inspired by the TGM series by Arika, available for Windows, GNU/Linux and macOS. It is the most accurate TGM clone available, and it features game modes based on Tetris The Grand Master, Tetris The Absolute The Grand Master 2 PLUS, and Tetris The Grand Master 3 Terror-Instinct.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Mac
  • 平台: Linux
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1-2
  • 发行日期: 2008年5月19日
  • 开发: Triosoft
